title: Stardock
description: We're a software development company that was founded in 1991 and incorporated in 1993 as "Stardock Systems". We initially developed for the OS/2 platform, but were forced to switch to Windows due to the collapse of the OS/2 software market between 1997 and 1998. We're best known for computer programs that allow user to modify or extend a graphical user interface as well as personal computer games
